entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries early this morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
